summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Blushing Blush Powder Blush is fresh, natural-looking color that builds to desired intensity with a sculpting brush.
details: DetailsBenefitsSilky blush formula sweeps effortlessly over cheekbones to create a natural look.Fresh, jet-milled color builds and blends beautifully with a custom sculpting brush.Lasting wear, color-true.Dermatologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy-tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2153764How To UseApply with Blush Brush or the included sculpting brush. Sweep blush on apples of cheeks, gently blending colour up cheekbone toward temple. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.IngredientsTalc, Dimethicone, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Nylon-12, Lauryl Laurate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Carmine (CI 75470), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 36 Lake (CI 12085), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 34 Lake (CI 15880), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 6 (CI 15850).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply with Blush Brush or the included sculpting brush. Sweep blush on apples of cheeks, gently blending colour up cheekbone toward temple. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.

reviews.headline: Duo
reviews.comments: I use this as an eyeshadow too. I have blonde hair blue eyes so this is product works great for both blush and shadow. I light layer for blush and layer a smidge darker for shadow. Et  voila!  C'est magnifique!

reviews.headline: true to color
reviews.comments: I can always count on Clinique to be a product that gives excellent results.  This blush is true to color and easy to blend.  Gives me a subtle bit of color on my cheeks.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT!!!!!
reviews.comments: This blush is the perfect blush for either a natural look, or very pigmented. the attached brush works so well with targeting specific areas. In when I use this blush, I do not apply concealer underneath since it conceals everything underneath it.

media.headline: I would buy this product again.

faceoff_positive.comments: If you are looking for a blush that is natural looking, variable in intensity, and long wearing this is it! I purchased this blush in Aglow and absolutely love it. You really can layer this to get a little or a lot of intensity. Even when you choose to layer a lot for intensity the blush doesn't look like a patch of color on your face it just keeps enhancing your skin's radiance. I also like the shape of the brush that comes with the blush. It makes it easier to enhance cheekbones.
faceoff_positive.headline: Truly Transparent

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm so used to the chalkier drugstore-brand blushes that when I purchased this one in Sunset Glow I was surprised how silky its texture was and how pigmented it was. The included brush picked up so much product that I found myself washing my face off one morning once because the blush had gone on too heavily. I've learned since to dab the brush once and brush it on sparingly to get the subtle glow, but I'm glad to know that the blush will last me a long time!
faceoff_negative.headline: Super Pigmented, Need to Apply Light-Handed
